title: Peanut butter and chocolate chip cookies
ingredients: ['225g unsalted butter', '200g caster sugar', '200g soft light brown sugar', '2 eggs', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract', '240g crunchy or smooth peanut butter', '340g plain flour', '2 1/2 teaspoons bicarbonate of soda', '1/2 teaspoon sea salt', '200g milk or white chocolate chips']
